title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of hotels, with a total of 7 data points.
Overall Number of hotels has decreased over the Year
Number of hotels is slightly constant from 2015 to 2009.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2011 and 2010.
Max Number of hotels about 1207.0 was recorded at Year 2015
Min Number of hotels about 942.0 was recorded at Year 2009
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of hotels with a total of 7 data points. The chart has one significant trend.
This trend is decreasing which exists from 2009 to 2015.
